quote: Rogerson,"" I asked him sweetly as we sat watching a video in the pool house, ""where would I find the pelagic zone?""""In the open sea,"" he said. ""Now shut up and eat your Junior Mints.
quote_letters: ROGERSON I ASKED HIM SWEETLY AS WE SAT WATCHING A VIDEO IN THE POOL HOUSE WHERE WOULD I FIND THE PELAGIC ZONEIN THE OPEN SEA HE SAID NOW SHUT UP AND EAT YOUR JUNIOR MINTS
